利用 python BaseStationDataGenerator.py 生成电信运营商数据，分析出在指定时间段内用户在基站的停留时间。

```
python BaseStationDataGenerator.py POS.txt 10000 2013-09-12 pos
python BaseStationDataGenerator.py NET.txt 1000 2013-09-12 net
```

**POS.txt**

```
0000000000    0047483647    1    00000155    2013-09-12 04:27:45
0000000000    0047483647    2    00000112    2013-09-12 05:28:16
0000000000    0047483647    0    00000155    2013-09-12 07:17:31
0000000000    0047483647    1    00000079    2013-09-12 08:45:19
0000000000    0047483647    3    00000040    2013-09-12 11:55:46
0000000000    0047483647    1    00000040    2013-09-12 12:18:28
0000000000    0047483647    2    00000155    2013-09-12 12:44:57
0000000000    0047483647    2    00000079    2013-09-12 13:36:04
0000000000    0047483647    2    00000040    2013-09-12 18:30:02
0000000000    0047483647    2    00000079    2013-09-12 19:32:57
0000000000    0047483647    0    00000112    2013-09-12 23:00:51
0000000001    0047483648    3    00000001    2013-09-12 00:05:38
0000000001    0047483648    0    00000085    2013-09-12 00:27:02
```
